title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 103 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 103 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: Bless the LORD, O my soul: and all that is within me, bless his holy name.
lineList.cn: （大卫的诗）。我的心哪，你要称颂耶和华。凡在我里面的，也要称颂他的圣名。

lineList.en: Bless the LORD, O my soul, and forget not all his benefits:
lineList.cn: 我的心哪，你要称颂耶和华，不可忘记他的一切恩惠。

lineList.en: Who forgiveth all thine iniquities; who healeth all thy diseases;
lineList.cn: 他赦免你的一切罪孽，医治你的一切疾病。

lineList.en: Who redeemeth thy life from destruction; who crowneth thee with lovingkindness and tender mercies;
lineList.cn: 他救赎你的命脱离死亡，以仁爱和慈悲为你的冠冕。

lineList.en: Who satisfieth thy mouth with good things; so that thy youth is renewed like the eagle's.
lineList.cn: 他用美物，使你所愿的得以知足，以致你如鹰反老还童。

lineList.en: The LORD executeth righteousness and judgment for all that are oppressed.
lineList.cn: 耶和华施行公义，为一切受屈的人伸冤。

lineList.en: He made known his ways unto Moses, his acts unto the children of Israel.
lineList.cn: 他使摩西知道他的法则，叫以色列人晓得他的作为。

lineList.en: The LORD is merciful and gracious, slow to anger, and plenteous in mercy.
lineList.cn: 耶和华有怜悯，有恩典，不轻易发怒，且有丰盛的慈爱。

lineList.en: He will not always chide: neither will he keep his anger for ever.
lineList.cn: 他不长久责备，也不永远怀怒。

lineList.en: He hath not dealt with us after our sins; nor rewarded us according to our iniquities.
lineList.cn: 他没有按我们的罪过待我们，也没有照我们的罪孽报应我们。

lineList.en: For as the heaven is high above the earth, so great is his mercy toward them that fear him.
lineList.cn: 天离地何等的高，他的慈爱向敬畏他的人，也是何等的大。

lineList.en: As far as the east is from the west, so far hath he removed our transgressions from us.
lineList.cn: 东离西有多远，他叫我们的过犯，离我们也有多远。

lineList.en: Like as a father pitieth his children, so the LORD pitieth them that fear him.
lineList.cn: 父亲怎样怜恤他的儿女，耶和华也怎样怜恤敬畏他的人。

lineList.en: For he knoweth our frame; he remembereth that we are dust.
lineList.cn: 因为他知道我们的本体，思念我们不过是尘土。

lineList.en: As for man, his days are as grass: as a flower of the field, so he flourisheth.
lineList.cn: 至于世人，他的年日如草一样。他发旺如野地的花。

lineList.en: For the wind passeth over it, and it is gone; and the place thereof shall know it no more.
lineList.cn: 经风一吹，便归无有。他的原处，也不再认识他。

lineList.en: But the mercy of the LORD is from everlasting to everlasting upon them that fear him, and his righteousness unto children's children;
lineList.cn: 但耶和华的慈爱，归于敬畏他的人，从亘古到永远。他的公义，也归于子子孙孙。

lineList.en: To such as keep his covenant, and to those that remember his commandments to do them.
lineList.cn: 就是那些遵守他的约，记念他的训词而遵行的人。

lineList.en: The LORD hath prepared his throne in the heavens; and his kingdom ruleth over all.
lineList.cn: 耶和华在天上立定宝座。他的权柄（原文作国）统管万有。

lineList.en: Bless the LORD, ye his angels, that excel in strength, that do his commandments, hearkening unto the voice of his word.
lineList.cn: 听从他命令成全他旨意有大能的天使，都要称颂耶和华。

lineList.en: Bless ye the LORD, all ye his hosts; ye ministers of his, that do his pleasure.
lineList.cn: 你们作他的诸军作他的仆役行他所喜悦的，都要称颂耶和华。

lineList.en: Bless the LORD, all his works in all places of his dominion: bless the LORD, O my soul.
lineList.cn: 你们一切被他造的，在他所治理的各处，都要称颂耶和华。我的心哪，你要称颂耶和华。
